Use the provided topic hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security And Risk Management > Personnel Security > Personnel Transfer and Role Change > Internal Transfer Procedures > Access Needs Review. Incorporate these elements: - Learning Objectives: [INSERT learning_objectives JSON array here] - Active Learning: [INSERT active_learning_components JSON here] (weave into scenario cards) - Scaffolding Layers: [INSERT scaffolding_layers JSON array here] (tag each card) - Flashcard Schema: [INSERT flashcard_generation_schema JSON here] Generate 40 high-quality flashcards optimized for Anki/Quizlet. Ensure progression: 30% Remember/Understand (Layers 1-2), 40% Apply/Analyze (Layer 3), 30% Evaluate/Create (Layer 4). Cover NIST SP 800-53 AC/IA families completely (e.g., AC-2 reviews on role changes), NIST CSF 2.0 Protect/ID, RBAC/ABAC, least privilege, misconceptions. Output as JSON array of objects: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': '...', 'distractors': ['opt1', 'opt2', 'opt3']}}, ...]. Make explanations educational with remediation, active learning ties, and sources.
